value.title: Power Apps Visual for Power BI | Build Live Application with Power Apps Visual inside Power BI

We will talk the step by step procedure that you should know about the Power Apps visualization inside the Power BI.  First, we will build a Power BI report with the DirectQuery Mode of SQL Server. value.title: Power BI DAX for Beginners: AVERAGE, AVERAGEA, AVERAGEX

value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx
